mapper.insert: insert into ORDER_MAIN (MEMBER_ID, ORDER_DATE, CREATED_DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE, LAST_MODIFIED_MEMBER, DELETED_DATE) values (#{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifiedMember,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{deletedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update ORDER_MAIN
MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
ORDER_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATED_DATE = #{createdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_MODIFIED_DATE = #{lastModifiedDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
